#summary Overview of installation options

= Introduction =

The !BigBlueButton 0.7 server runs under Linux and BSD.  To setup your own !BigBlueButton server:
    * [BigBlueButtonVM Download the BigBlueButton Virtual Machine] 
    * [InstallationUbuntu Install on Ubuntu 9.04 32-bit or Ubuntu 10.04 32-bit/64-bit] 
    * [InstallingBigBlueButton Install on Ubuntu from source]
    * [InstallingBigBlueButtonFreeBSD Install on FreeBSD/PC-BSD]

Instructions for 0.64 release:
    * [RPMPackaging Install on CentOS 5.4 32-bit/64-bit (15 minutes)] (yellow belt, one brown stripe)
    * [InstallingBigBlueButtonFedora Install from source (Fedora)] (brown belt)
    * [InstallingBigBlueButtonCentOS Install from source (CentOS)] (brown belt, two black stripes) 

Regardless of the way you choose, the following page shows the configuration files:

   * [ConfigurationFiles Configuration Files]
